session.welcome: Are you ready to test your ingenuity?

error.login-send: Your email or password are not found in our database

error.empty_password: The confirm password label can not be empty
error.password_mismatch: The password and confirm password labels must match

rules.description1: Welcome to the exciting world of KiWiQ! In this challenging game, your goal is to embark on a journey full of knowledge and fun.
rules.description2: Each question is a door to a universe of possibilities, with four options before you. But be careful, only one of those options is the golden key that will unlock the treasure of the correct answer.
rules.description3: With just 30 seconds for each question, you'll feel the adrenaline rushing through your veins as you fight against the clock to find the perfect answer. Take on the standard challenge with 9 questions waiting for you in each match, or venture into the custom terrain, where you can choose your own route. Do you feel brave? Or do you prefer strategy?
rules.description4: At the end of the road, your score will be your badge of honor. Can you achieve maximum glory and become the KiWiQ champion? Only time will tell!
